additionalProperty.name: LabelChain2
additionalProperty.description: Second chain in the assembly interface

additionalProperty.name: Buried Surface Area (BSA)
additionalProperty.description: Total buried surface area at the interface

additionalProperty.name: Atomic Contacts
additionalProperty.description: Number of atomic contacts at the interface

additionalProperty.name: Gene
additionalProperty.description: Gene name associated with the protein

additionalProperty.name: Pfam
additionalProperty.description: Pfam domain classification

additionalProperty.name: BSA Polar
additionalProperty.description: Polar component of buried surface area

additionalProperty.name: BSA Apolar
additionalProperty.description: Apolar component of buried surface area

additionalProperty.name: Fraction Polar
additionalProperty.description: Fraction of polar contacts at the interface

additionalProperty.name: Fraction Apolar
additionalProperty.description: Fraction of apolar contacts at the interface

additionalProperty.name: ClusterID
additionalProperty.description: Sequence cluster ID from BLASTClust analysis

additionalProperty.name: ClusterSize
additionalProperty.description: Number of interfaces in this cluster

additionalProperty.name: ClusterMembers
additionalProperty.description: List of other interfaces in the same cluster (excluding current interface)

additionalProperty.name: ClusterMethod
additionalProperty.description: Method used for sequence-based clustering

additionalProperty.name: ClusterMethodOptions
additionalProperty.description: BLASTClust parameters used for sequence clustering
